title: builders: stop trying subrepos for nacl builds?
body:
The nacl builder fails almost all subrepos.

Stop trying?

We at least need a --subrepos=false flag so we can run "make check" on the
nacl Docker images and verify the nacl environment is correct. Right now it tries to
build the subrepos and fails, so the Makefile would like to skip them.

But perhaps the builders as a whole should skip them.
